com.reply.solidsoft.nbs.integration.extensions

Class MemoryCache<K,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reply.solidsoft.nbs.integration.extensions.MemoryCache<K,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of the key values.
    T - The type of the values stored in the memory cache.

    public class MemoryCache<K,T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A memory cache manager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MemoryCache

        public MemoryCache(long timeToLive,
                   long timerInterval,
                   int maxItems)
        Initializes a new instance of the MemoryCache class.
        Parameters:
        timeToLive - The time that an entry will live in the cache.
        timerInterval - The interval at which the memory cache will be cleaned u and old entries purged.
        maxItems - The maximium number of items allowed in the memory cache.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(K key,
                T value)
        Puts a new value into the memory cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The key value of the new entry.
        value - The value to be put into the memory cache.

      • get

        public T get(K key)
        Gets a value from the memory cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The key value for the memory cache entry.
        Returns:
        A value held in the memory cache.

        public void remove(K key)
        Remove an entry form the memory cache.
        Parameters:
        key - The key value of the entry to be removed.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the current size of the memory cache.
        Returns:
        The size of the memory cache.
